title: Buffett Critic Has Extra Mustard, Less Bread
text:
David Rolfe and the investment firm he helms, Wedgewood Partners, are hardly household names. The Missouri-based firm got plenty of press recently, though, by dissing a far more famous Midwestern investor.

“The Great Bull could have been one helluva of an astounding career denouement” for Berkshire Hathaway’s Warren Buffett, he wrote, while announcing he had dumped its shares. Mr. Rolfe quipped that dud investments didn’t “cut the Heinz mustard” while also pointing out missed opportunities such as Visa.

...
description: David Rolfe and Wedgewood Partners are hardly household names. The Missouri-based firm got plenty of press recently, though, by dissing a far more famous Midwestern investor.
